item.title: Stat reset?
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello, i’ve basically added a npc which when you talk to him he says what stat do you want to reset, and then its got ur choice which says attack or defence…

Here’s my code for that bit

case 116: talk("What stats would you like to reset? It Will cost 2Bil cash to reset One", 606); break; case 117: choice("Attack.", "Defence."); break;

How do i make it so that if you click attack, it deletes ur attk exp to 0 and attk lv to 1, and if you click def it resets ur def xp to 0 and lv to 1.
Also i want to make it so that, when you click one it takes your 2 bil cash if so you’ve got it.

Help will be appreciated thanks

Read full topic
